text: Çiftçi is a Turkish surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Cüneyt Çiftçi, Turkish-German perpetrator of the 2008 Khost suicide bombing * Nadir Çiftçi, Turkish footballer * Serkan Çiftçi, Austrian footballer * Uğur Çiftçi, Turkish footballer Category:Turkish-language surnames
title: Çiftçi
